name: ext_R5_Provenance_agent
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Provenance.agent for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents Provenance.agent from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Provenance|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R2.

element.definition: An actor taking a role in an activity  for which it can be assigned some degree of responsibility for the activity taking place.
element.comment: `Provenance.agent` maps to R2 `Provenance.agent`. To multiple elements in Provenance: (`Provenance.agent.relatedAgent`, `Provenance.agent`). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `Provenance.agent` maps to R2 `Provenance.agent.relatedAgent`. To multiple elements in Provenance: (`Provenance.agent.relatedAgent`, `Provenance.agent`). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
